testcase.classname: Create file, Delete File and Restore file from rubbish bin
testcase.name: Create text file (a.txt), Delete it and verify it can be restored from Rubbish Bin
testcase.system-out: Given I login to mega website using email "sukeerthkumar@gmail.com" and password "sukeerth".passed Then I create new text file "a" with content "megatesting"..................passed And I verify file "a" is created............................................passed Then I Delete the file "a"..................................................passed And I verify File "a" is deleted............................................passed And I navigate to rubbish bin folder........................................passed And I restore the deleted file "a" from rubbish bin folder..................passed And I verify file "a" is restored successfully..............................passed

testcase.classname: Validate all the Linux Distros in the list are downloadable
testcase.name: validate all the Linux Distros in the list are downloadable
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to "https://mega.nz/desktop"...............................passed Then I Click on button "Linux"..............................................passed And validate all the Linux versions in the list are downloadable............passed
